text: Ceyhan Yazar (born February 1, 1944), is a former Turkish soccer player who played in the NASL. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Rochester Lancers |1970 |rowspan="2"|NASL |7||0||0||0||0||0||7||0 |- |New York Cosmos |1971 |9||2||0||0||0||0||9||2 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !16!!2!!0!!0!!0!!0!!16!!2 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:Living people Category:Turkish footballers Category:Turkish expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Göztepe S.K. footballers Category:Rochester Lancers (1967–1980) players Category:New York Cosmos players Category:North American Soccer League (1968–1984) players Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Turkish expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:1944 births
